body.name: Sensyne 72" Phone Tripod, Extendable Tripod for iPhone & Selfie Stick with Detachable Phone Holder & Wireless Remote, iPhone Tripod Compatible with All Cell Phones, Camera
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 10 hrs 7 mins
features: Transformative Photography: Discover a new standard with Sensyne Selfie Stick. Transcending traditional tripods, it offers precision craftsmanship for stable photos and videos. Unleash your photographic potential effortlessly.

Versatile Sensyne Phone Tripod: Capture from new heights with its impressive 72-inch reach. Engineered for stability, extended leg length ensures confidence in every shot. Redesigned grip offers enhanced comfort and control—an extension of your photographic vision.

Revolutionary Compatibility: Sensyne tripod stand as the epitome of camera integration, offering unmatched versatility that sets it apart from various selfie sticks on the market, heralding a new era of seamless photographic synergy.

All-in-One Convenience: Elevate your photography with seamless integration—an extendable phone clamp compatible with all cellphones, an effortless wireless remote, and a matching wrist strap for added security.

Comprehensive Package: Includes 1 x Selfie Stick Tripod, Phone Holder, Remote, A Wrist Strap. Contact us for any issues. Enjoy peace of mind with our 12-month replacement service and dedicated support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stabilized Tripod Mode Don't let solitude stop your journey. Sensyne selfie stick: Your companion in solo exploration!
Mobile Handheld Mode Solo but not alone. Sensyne selfie stick – your lens to solo travel brilliance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and compact
reviews.reviewText: I like how slim and sleek this folds down into when in “selfie stick” mode. Entends an insane amount which I would never use fully extended. Build quality feels nice with smooth operation. Useful adjustment/tightening knob for the standard camera mount screw. Nice wide base for the tripod feet when opened up. Phone mount works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: This is for me the perfect tool. I absolutely love it. I am not a selfie-stick guy, but I have wanted a good portable tripod for a long time. This offers so much flexibility it's really impressive. The length is short enough that I can fit it into my travel sling but long enough that it is able to stand up securely. The legs flip out with a pull-apart action at the bottom of it. The top pulls up off the end and has forward and back tilting options which work great both in the selfie-stick and tripod configuration.The remote is quick and responsive and Bluetooth-pairing it was quick and easy. I have used it many times and have yet to recharge it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the money
reviews.reviewText: Really stable, good product, value for the money . It fits my iPhone 15 pro max perfectly . I like that it comes with a remote which attaches to the tripod, so no need to carry it separately. Easily foldable. Wish it comes with a carry bag but it’s ok for the price . Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is very sturdy, holds my phone even with a pop socket on it, and the remote— game changer! Nice and compact, can’t wait to take it on my next hike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really useful for taking pictures
reviews.reviewText: This is a sweet setup. I love that it can be a selfie stick or a full tripod. It is super tall, but folds up into a portable frame that’s easy to carry around. The remote pairs easily and works well. Makes taking group photos so much easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Perfect tripod and selfie stick for my phone. Easy to clip my phone on and easy to adjust. It’s also quite sturdy and just what I needed for video!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend this selfie stick/tripod because is super light weight and compact, perfect for travel is wireless remote shutter, great for wide perspectives, the tripod is super stable good quality materials made off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very excited about this!
reviews.reviewText: I just received this selfie stick and am thrilled with how it works. As a content creator I needed something easy, efficient, and versatile. This extendable/selfie stick fits my needs perfectly. I absolutely love that it extends to 72 inches and that you can use your phone in either vertical or horizontal positions. The grip is quite comfortable and it comes with a remote and wrist strap which give added benefits. This is a great value for the price and I am very happy with this purchase!
